WorkItem.Description:
Keyboard navigation while IsVirtualizing==true causes exceptions...

Try opening the "VirtualizationSample", enable "Virtualize Items", click "Load Items", click on an item, and then use the keyboard to navigate up and down.  I think the exception happened for me when I navigated down to the last visible item, tried to go one further down, and then tried to go back up more.

I currently don't have plans to use virtualization... so I didn't try to figure out what is going wrong in the code... sorry!
WorkItem.Summary: Keyboard navigation while IsVirtualizing==true causes exceptions
